titleStmt.title: The counterfeit bridegroom, or, The defeated widow a comedy, as it is acted at His Royal Highness the Duke's Theatre.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.
Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
Betterton, Thomas, 1635?-1710.

notesStmt.note: An alteration of Middleton's "No wit, no help like a woman's", ascribed to Mrs. Behn and to Betterton. Cf. Genest's Account of the English stage, v. 1, p. 212-213; A. Nicoll's History of restoration drama, 1660-1700, p. 247.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
